name: Baker
ability: You start knowing 3 characters, 1 and only 1 of which is in play.

firstNightReminder: Show a number of outsiders neighbouring evil player.
name: Houndmaster
ability: You start knowing how many outsiders are a neighbour to evil player. [+1 Outsider]

firstNightReminder: Stablekeeper points to a player. They are drunk, then they can't die, then they learn their alignment.
name: Stablekeeper
ability: You start by choosing a player: they are drunk until dusk, then they can't die until the next dusk, then you learn their alignment.

otherNightReminder: Private eye chooses a character, show thumbs up or thumbs down.
firstNightReminder: Private eye chooses a character, show thumbs up or thumbs down.
name: Private eye
ability: Each night, choose a character: learn if they are in play. Once per game, at night, you are drunk.

firstNightReminder: Show thumbs up or thumbs down.
otherNightReminder: Show thumbs up or thumbs down.
name: Prophet
ability: Each night, learn if you die the next night.

name: Jezus Christ
ability: Each night*, you might be resurrected.

otherNightReminder: Elf's wish may come true, even if dead.
name: Elf
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to make a wish. It might come true, even if you are dead.

otherNightReminder: If the adventurer's quest has been resolved, it's outcome may take place.
name: Adventurer
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn a quest. You only learn a new one once it's been resolved.

firstNightReminder: Jailer may choose a character, if they are good they are drunk and can't die.
otherNightReminder: Jailer may choose a character, if they are good they are drunk and can't die.
name: Jailer
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a character: if they are good they are drunk and can't die.

otherNightReminder: If Pig farmer died today, they choose a player.
name: Pig farmer
ability: Once per game, at night, choose a dead player: learn their character and alignment.

otherNightReminder: If the Shaman chose a character today, show 'you are' token to a player and then the chosen character token.
name: Shaman
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a character: an alive player becomes this character tonight (if not in play).

otherNightReminder: If Mistress died tonight, one of the chosen players dies and the other learns the Mistress player.
name: Mistress
ability: If you die at night, choose 2 players: one learns who you are and the other dies.

firstNightReminder: Show a character token. They are drunk when girlfriend is dead.
name: Girlfriend
ability: You start knowing a character. If you are dead, they are drunk.

otherNightReminder: Neighbours might become cold. Show Frosty how many players were cold today or last night.
name: Frosty
ability: Your neighbours might be cold. Each night*, learn how many players were cold today or last night.

name: Old Harry
ability: Once per game, whenever another alive player says 'Old Harry', they die immediately.

otherNightReminder: If Rudolph died today, the demon learns their best target and their character.
name: Rudolph
ability: If you died today or tonight, the demon learns their best target and their character.

otherNightReminder: Judas may choose a character to become. Wake that character and show them 'you are' token and then Judas token and that they are good.
name: Judas
ability: Each night*, you may choose a character (not Judas): they die. If they die, you swap characters and they become good.

otherNightReminder: Krampus points to a player. A player chosen the previous night might be resurrected.
name: Krampus
ability: Each night*, choose a player: If not a demon, they die. A dead player you chose last night might be resurrected.

firstNightReminder: Jack frost points to a player, they are cold until dusk.
otherNightReminder: Jack frost points to a player, they are cold until dusk.
name: Jack Frost
ability: Each night, choose a player: they are cold until dusk.

firstNightReminder: Demon learns who the Cockroach is.
name: Cockroach
ability: You think you are an outsider, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are. [+1 evil Outsider]

otherNightReminder: Santa Claws points to one or two players. They choose if they die tonight or tomorrow night.
name: Santa Claws
ability: Each night*, choose one or two players: they choose if they die tonight or tomorrow night.

otherNightReminder: Saint nicholas points to a player: they die.
firstNightReminder: Saint nicholas points to two players: 1st is poisoned and 2nd survives first execution.
name: Saint Nicholas
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing 2 players: 1st is poisoned and 2nd survives one execution.

otherNightReminder: Grinch points to a player: they die. Then Grinch might use their ability.
name: Grinch
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If they die, you have their ability and register as their character until next night.

otherNightReminder: Grýla is resurrected. Grýla points to a player: they die.
name: Grýla
ability: Each night*, you are resurrected and choose a player: they die, even if you are dead. Evil loses if & only if all other evil players are dead. [1 Townsfolk is evil]
